name: The Lift (itch) (NiklasHeikki)
description:
The Lift is a puzzle/escape room-style singleplayer game, where the player's goal is to solve puzzles while uncovering the secrets of his past in order to progress through each level using the Lift, operated by the mysterious Lift Operator.

The Lift was created in Unreal Engine 5 by Group number 13 during a summer game development course (Kesäpeliopinnot 2022) held by Lapland University of Applied Sciences and the University of Lapland. Development took approximately three months.

Group 13:

Niklas Heikki (Level Design, Lead Programmer, UI Design, Intro Design)

Eetu Kuittinen (Script, Level Design, Programming)

Jere Puittinen (Level Design, Programming)

Miika Mononen (Script, Level Design, Programming)

Joni Satta (Designed and created various 3D-assets)

Juho Törmälä (Script, Sounds, Music,  Dialogue, Programming)

All 3rd party assets credited in "TheLift Asset List.pdf"
